summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1836, for the improvement of Charles Street, in the City of Seattle, from Maynard Avenue to the existing plank roadway on Seattle Boulevard, by planking the same, under Ordinance No. 19028, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
